VisualBridgeContext: The person who gets fired if the budget bleeds.
The person manually renaming 500 resource groups.
The gatekeeper of the subscription vending machine.
The one fighting for GPU quota in East US 2.
The shield between your data and the public model.
The consumer adding chaos to your layout.
The investigator drowning in Sentinel alerts.
The signature on the risk acceptance form.
The architect of your Entra ID dependency hell.
